9 #ifndef V8PP_CLASS_HPP_INCLUDED
10 #define V8PP_CLASS_HPP_INCLUDED

12 #include <algorithm>
13 #include <memory>
14 #include <type_traits>
15 #include <unordered_map>
16 #include <vector>
17 #include <list>
18 
19 #include "v8pp/config.hpp"

21 #include "v8pp/function.hpp"
22 #include "v8pp/property.hpp"

25 namespace v8pp {
26 
27 namespace detail {
28 
29 std::string pointer_str(void const* ptr);
30 
31 struct class_info
32 {
33  type_info const type;
34  type_info const traits;
35 
36  class_info(type_info const& type, type_info const& traits);
37 
38  virtual ~class_info() = default; // make virtual to delete derived object_registry
39 
40  std::string class_name() const;
41 };
42 
43 template<typename Traits>
44 class object_registry final : public class_info
45 {
46 public:
47  using pointer_type = typename Traits::pointer_type;
48  using const_pointer_type = typename Traits::const_pointer_type;
49  using object_id = typename Traits::object_id;
50 
51  using ctor_function = std::function<pointer_type (v8::FunctionCallbackInfo<v8::Value> const& args)>;
52  using dtor_function = std::function<void (v8::Isolate*, pointer_type const&)>;
53  using cast_function = pointer_type (*)(pointer_type const&);
54 
55  object_registry(v8::Isolate* isolate, type_info const& type, dtor_function&& dtor)
56  : class_info(type, type_id<Traits>())
57  , isolate_(isolate)
58  , ctor_() // no wrapped class constructor available by default
59  , dtor_(std::move(dtor))
60  {
61  v8::HandleScope scope(isolate_);
62 
63  v8::Local<v8::FunctionTemplate> func = v8::FunctionTemplate::New(isolate_);
64  v8::Local<v8::FunctionTemplate> js_func = v8::FunctionTemplate::New(isolate_,
65  [](v8::FunctionCallbackInfo<v8::Value> const& args)
66  {
67  v8::Isolate* isolate = args.GetIsolate();
68  object_registry* this_ = get_external_data<object_registry*>(args.Data());
69  try
70  {
71  return args.GetReturnValue().Set(this_->wrap_object(args));
72  }
73  catch (std::exception const& ex)
74  {
75  args.GetReturnValue().Set(throw_ex(isolate, ex.what()));
76  }
77  }, set_external_data(isolate, this));
78 
79  func_.Reset(isolate, func);
80  js_func_.Reset(isolate, js_func);
81 
82  // each JavaScript instance has 3 internal fields:
83  // 0 - pointer to a wrapped C++ object
84  // 1 - pointer to this object_registry
85  // 2 - pointer to the object destructor
86  func->InstanceTemplate()->SetInternalFieldCount(3);
87  func->Inherit(js_func);
88  }
89 
90  object_registry(object_registry const&) = delete;
91  object_registry(object_registry && src) // = default; Visual C++ can't do this: error C2610
92  : class_info(std::move(static_cast<class_info&&>(src)))
93  , bases_(std::move(src.bases_))
94  , derivatives_(std::move(src.derivatives_))
95  , objects_(std::move(src.objects_))
96  , isolate_(std::move(src.isolate_))
97  , func_(std::move(src.func_))
98  , js_func_(std::move(src.js_func_))
99  , ctor_(std::move(src.ctor_))
100  , dtor_(std::move(src.dtor_))
101  {
102  }
103 
104  object_registry& operator=(object_registry const&) = delete;
105  object_registry& operator=(object_registry &&) = delete;
106 
107  ~object_registry()
108  {
109  remove_objects();
110  }
111 
112  v8::Isolate* isolate() { return isolate_; }
113 
114  v8::Local<v8::FunctionTemplate> class_function_template()
115  {
116  return to_local(isolate_, func_);
117  }
118 
119  v8::Local<v8::FunctionTemplate> js_function_template()
120  {
121  return to_local(isolate_, js_func_);
122  }
123 
124  void set_ctor(ctor_function&& ctor) { ctor_ = std::move(ctor); }
125 
126  void add_base(object_registry& info, cast_function cast)
127  {
128  auto it = std::find_if(bases_.begin(), bases_.end(),
129  [&info](base_class_info const& base) { return &base.info == &info; });
130  if (it != bases_.end())
131  {
132  //assert(false && "duplicated inheritance");
133  throw std::runtime_error(class_name()
134  + " is already inherited from " + info.class_name());
135  }
136  bases_.emplace_back(info, cast);
137  info.derivatives_.emplace_back(this);
138  }
139 
140  bool cast(pointer_type& ptr, type_info const& type) const
141  {
142  if (this->type == type || !ptr)
143  {
144  return true;
145  }
146 
147  // fast way - search a direct parent
148  for (base_class_info const& base : bases_)
149  {
150  if (base.info.type == type)
151  {
152  ptr = base.cast(ptr);
153  return true;
154  }
155  }
156 
157  // slower way - walk on hierarhy
158  for (base_class_info const& base : bases_)
159  {
160  pointer_type p = base.cast(ptr);
161  if (base.info.cast(p, type))
162  {
163  ptr = p;
164  return true;
165  }
166  }
167  return false;
168  }
169 
170  void remove_object(object_id const& obj)
171  {
172  auto it = objects_.find(Traits::key(obj));
173  assert(it != objects_.end() && "no object");
174  if (it != objects_.end())
175  {
176  v8::HandleScope scope(isolate_);
177  reset_object(*it);
178  objects_.erase(it);
179  }
180  }
181 
182  void remove_objects()
183  {
184  v8::HandleScope scope(isolate_);
185  for (auto& object : objects_)
186  {
187  reset_object(object);
188  }
189  objects_.clear();
190  }
191 
192  pointer_type find_object(object_id id, type_info const& type) const
193  {
194  auto it = objects_.find(Traits::key(id));
195  if (it != objects_.end())
196  {
197  pointer_type ptr = it->first;
198  if (cast(ptr, type))
199  {
200  return ptr;
201  }
202  }
203  return nullptr;
204  }
205 
206  v8::Local<v8::Object> find_v8_object(pointer_type const& ptr) const
207  {
208  auto it = objects_.find(ptr);
209  if (it != objects_.end())
210  {
211  return to_local(isolate_, it->second);
212  }
213 
214  v8::Local<v8::Object> result;
215  for (auto const info : derivatives_)
216  {
217  result = info->find_v8_object(ptr);
218  if (!result.IsEmpty()) break;
219  }
220  return result;
221  }
222 
223  v8::Local<v8::Object> wrap_object(pointer_type const& object, bool call_dtor)
224  {
225  auto it = objects_.find(object);
226  if (it != objects_.end())
227  {
228  //assert(false && "duplicate object");
229  throw std::runtime_error(class_name()
230  + " duplicate object " + pointer_str(Traits::pointer_id(object)));
231  }
232 
233  v8::EscapableHandleScope scope(isolate_);
234 
235  v8::Local<v8::Context> context = isolate_->GetCurrentContext();
236  v8::Local<v8::Object> obj = class_function_template()
237  ->GetFunction(context).ToLocalChecked()->NewInstance(context).ToLocalChecked();
238 
239  obj->SetAlignedPointerInInternalField(0, Traits::pointer_id(object));
240  obj->SetAlignedPointerInInternalField(1, this);
241  obj->SetAlignedPointerInInternalField(2, call_dtor? /*dtor_*/this : nullptr);
242 
243  v8::Global<v8::Object> pobj(isolate_, obj);
244  pobj.SetWeak(this, [](v8::WeakCallbackInfo<object_registry> const& data)
245  {
246  object_id object = data.GetInternalField(0);
247  object_registry* this_ = static_cast<object_registry*>(data.GetInternalField(1));
248  this_->remove_object(object);
249  }, v8::WeakCallbackType::kInternalFields);
250  objects_.emplace(object, std::move(pobj));
251 
252  return scope.Escape(obj);
253  }
254 
255  v8::Local<v8::Object> wrap_object(v8::FunctionCallbackInfo<v8::Value> const& args)
256  {
257  if (!ctor_)
258  {
259  //assert(false && "create not allowed");
260  throw std::runtime_error(class_name() + " has no constructor");
261  }
262  return wrap_object(ctor_(args), true);
263  }
264 
265  pointer_type unwrap_object(v8::Local<v8::Value> value)
266  {
267  v8::HandleScope scope(isolate_);
268 
269  while (value->IsObject())
270  {
271  v8::Local<v8::Object> obj = value.As<v8::Object>();
272  if (obj->InternalFieldCount() == 3)
273  {
274  object_id id = obj->GetAlignedPointerFromInternalField(0);
275  if (id)
276  {
277  auto registry = static_cast<object_registry*>(
278  obj->GetAlignedPointerFromInternalField(1));
279  if (registry)
280  {
281  pointer_type ptr = registry->find_object(id, type);
282  if (ptr)
283  {
284  return ptr;
285  }
286  }
287  }
288  }
289  value = obj->GetPrototype();
290  }
291  return nullptr;
292  }
293 
294 private:
295  void reset_object(std::pair<pointer_type const, v8::Global<v8::Object>>& object)
296  {
297  bool call_dtor = true;
298  if (!object.second.IsNearDeath())
299  {
300  v8::Local<v8::Object> obj = to_local(isolate_, object.second);
301  assert(obj->InternalFieldCount() == 3);
302  assert(obj->GetAlignedPointerFromInternalField(0) == Traits::pointer_id(object.first));
303  assert(obj->GetAlignedPointerFromInternalField(1) == this);
304  call_dtor = (obj->GetAlignedPointerFromInternalField(2) != nullptr);
305  // remove internal fields to disable unwrapping for this V8 Object
306  obj->SetAlignedPointerInInternalField(0, nullptr);
307  obj->SetAlignedPointerInInternalField(1, nullptr);
308  obj->SetAlignedPointerInInternalField(2, nullptr);
309  }
310  if (call_dtor)
311  {
312  dtor_(isolate_, object.first);
313  }
314  object.second.Reset();
315  }
316 
317  struct base_class_info
318  {
319  object_registry& info;
320  cast_function cast;
321 
322  base_class_info(object_registry& info, cast_function cast)
323  : info(info)
324  , cast(cast)
325  {
326  }
327  };
328 
329  std::vector<base_class_info> bases_;
330  std::vector<object_registry*> derivatives_;
331 
332  std::unordered_map<pointer_type, v8::Global<v8::Object>> objects_;
333 
334  v8::Isolate* isolate_;
335  v8::Global<v8::FunctionTemplate> func_;
336  v8::Global<v8::FunctionTemplate> js_func_;
337 
338  ctor_function ctor_;
339  dtor_function dtor_;
340 };
341 
342 class classes
343 {
344 public:
345  template<typename Traits>
346  static object_registry<Traits>& add(v8::Isolate* isolate, type_info const& type,
347  typename object_registry<Traits>::dtor_function&& dtor)
348  {
349  classes* info = instance(operation::add, isolate);
350  auto it = info->find(type);
351  if (it != info->classes_.end())
352  {
353  //assert(false && "class already registred");
354  throw std::runtime_error((*it)->class_name()
355  + " is already exist in isolate " + pointer_str(isolate));
356  }
357  info->classes_.emplace_back(new object_registry<Traits>(isolate, type, std::move(dtor)));
358  return *static_cast<object_registry<Traits>*>(info->classes_.back().get());
359  }
360 
361  template<typename Traits>
362  static void remove(v8::Isolate* isolate, type_info const& type)
363  {
364  classes* info = instance(operation::get, isolate);
365  if (info)
366  {
367  auto it = info->find(type);
368  if (it != info->classes_.end())
369  {
370  type_info const& traits = type_id<Traits>();
371  if ((*it)->traits != traits)
372  {
373  throw std::runtime_error((*it)->class_name()
374  + " is already registered in isolate "
375  + pointer_str(isolate) + " before of "
376  + class_info(type, traits).class_name());
377  }
378  info->classes_.erase(it);
379  if (info->classes_.empty())
380  {
381  instance(operation::remove, isolate);
382  }
383  }
384  }
385  }
386 
387  template<typename Traits>
388  static object_registry<Traits>& find(v8::Isolate* isolate, type_info const& type)
389  {
390  classes* info = instance(operation::get, isolate);
391  type_info const& traits = type_id<Traits>();
392  if (info)
393  {
394  auto it = info->find(type);
395  if (it != info->classes_.end())
396  {
397  if ((*it)->traits != traits)
398  {
399  throw std::runtime_error((*it)->class_name()
400  + " is already registered in isolate "
401  + pointer_str(isolate) + " before of "
402  + class_info(type, traits).class_name());
403  }
404  return *static_cast<object_registry<Traits>*>(it->get());
405  }
406  }
407  //assert(false && "class not registered");
408  throw std::runtime_error(class_info(type, traits).class_name()
409  + " is not registered in isolate " + pointer_str(isolate));
410  }
411 
412  static void remove_all(v8::Isolate* isolate);
413 
414 private:
415  using classes_info = std::vector<std::unique_ptr<class_info>>;
416  classes_info classes_;
417 
418  classes_info::iterator find(type_info const& type);
419 
420  enum class operation { get, add, remove };
421  static classes* instance(operation op, v8::Isolate* isolate);
422 };
423 
424 } // namespace detail
425 
427 template<typename T, typename Traits = raw_ptr_traits>
428 class class_
429 {
430  static_assert(is_wrapped_class<T>::value, "T must be a user-defined class");
431 
432  using object_registry = detail::object_registry<Traits>;
433  object_registry& class_info_;
434 
435  using object_id = typename object_registry::object_id;
436  using pointer_type = typename object_registry::pointer_type;
437  using const_pointer_type = typename object_registry::const_pointer_type;
438 
439 public:
440  using object_pointer_type = typename Traits::template object_pointer_type<T>;
441  using object_const_pointer_type = typename Traits::template object_const_pointer_type<T>;
442 
443  template<typename ...Args>
444  struct factory_create
445  {
446  static object_pointer_type call(v8::FunctionCallbackInfo<v8::Value> const& args)
447  {
448  using ctor_function = object_pointer_type (*)(v8::Isolate* isolate, Args...);
449  return detail::call_from_v8<Traits, ctor_function>(&factory<T, Traits>::create, args);
450  }
451  };
452 
453  using ctor_function = std::function<object_pointer_type (v8::FunctionCallbackInfo<v8::Value> const& args)>;
454  using dtor_function = std::function<void (v8::Isolate* isolate, object_pointer_type const& obj)>;
455 
456 public:
457  explicit class_(v8::Isolate* isolate, dtor_function destroy = &factory<T, Traits>::destroy)
458  : class_info_(detail::classes::add<Traits>(isolate, detail::type_id<T>(),
459  [destroy = std::move(destroy)](v8::Isolate* isolate, pointer_type const& obj)
460  {
461  destroy(isolate, Traits::template static_pointer_cast<T>(obj));
462  }))
463  {
464  }
465 
467  template<typename ...Args, typename Create = factory_create<Args...>>
468  class_& ctor(ctor_function create = &Create::call)
469  {
470  class_info_.set_ctor([create = std::move(create)](v8::FunctionCallbackInfo<v8::Value> const& args)
471  {
472  return create(args);
473  });
474  return *this;
475  }
476 
478  template<typename U>
479  class_& inherit()
480  {
481  using namespace detail;
482  static_assert(std::is_base_of<U, T>::value,
483  "Class U should be base for class T");
484  //TODO: std::is_convertible<T*, U*> and check for duplicates in hierarchy?
485  object_registry& base = classes::find<Traits>(isolate(), type_id<U>());
486  class_info_.add_base(base, [](pointer_type const& ptr) -> pointer_type
487  {
488  return pointer_type(Traits::template static_pointer_cast<U>(
489  Traits::template static_pointer_cast<T>(ptr)));
490  });
491  class_info_.js_function_template()->Inherit(base.class_function_template());
492  return *this;
493  }
494 
496  template<typename Method>
497  typename std::enable_if<
498  std::is_member_function_pointer<Method>::value, class_&>::type
499  set(char const *name, Method mem_func, v8::PropertyAttribute attr = v8::None)
500  {
501  using mem_func_type =
502  typename detail::function_traits<Method>::template pointer_type<T>;
503  mem_func_type mf(mem_func);
504  class_info_.class_function_template()->PrototypeTemplate()->Set(
505  v8pp::to_v8(isolate(), name), v8::FunctionTemplate::New(isolate(),
506  &detail::forward_function<Traits, mem_func_type>,
507  detail::set_external_data(isolate(), std::forward<mem_func_type>(mf))), attr);
508  return *this;
509  }
510 
512  template<typename Function,
513  typename Func = typename std::decay<Function>::type>
514  typename std::enable_if<detail::is_callable<Func>::value, class_&>::type
515  set(char const *name, Function&& func, v8::PropertyAttribute attr = v8::None)
516  {
517  v8::Local<v8::Data> wrapped_fun =
518  wrap_function_template(isolate(), std::forward<Func>(func));
519  class_info_.class_function_template()
520  ->PrototypeTemplate()->Set(v8pp::to_v8(isolate(), name), wrapped_fun, attr);
521  class_info_.js_function_template()->Set(v8pp::to_v8(isolate(), name), wrapped_fun, attr);
522  return *this;
523  }
524 
526  template<typename Attribute>
527  typename std::enable_if<
528  std::is_member_object_pointer<Attribute>::value, class_&>::type
529  set(char const *name, Attribute attribute, bool readonly = false)
530  {
531  v8::HandleScope scope(isolate());
532 
533  using attribute_type = typename
534  detail::function_traits<Attribute>::template pointer_type<T>;
535  attribute_type attr(attribute);
536  v8::AccessorGetterCallback getter = &member_get<attribute_type>;
537  v8::AccessorSetterCallback setter = &member_set<attribute_type>;
538  if (readonly)
539  {
540  setter = nullptr;
541  }
542 
543  class_info_.class_function_template()->PrototypeTemplate()
544  ->SetAccessor(v8pp::to_v8(isolate(), name), getter, setter,
545  detail::set_external_data(isolate(),
546  std::forward<attribute_type>(attr)), v8::DEFAULT,
547  v8::PropertyAttribute(v8::DontDelete | (setter? 0 : v8::ReadOnly)));
548  return *this;
549  }
550 
552  template<typename GetMethod, typename SetMethod>
553  typename std::enable_if<std::is_member_function_pointer<GetMethod>::value
554  && std::is_member_function_pointer<SetMethod>::value, class_&>::type
555  set(char const *name, property_<GetMethod, SetMethod>&& property)
556  {
557  v8::HandleScope scope(isolate());
558 
559  using property_type = property_<
560  typename detail::function_traits<GetMethod>::template pointer_type<T>,
561  typename detail::function_traits<SetMethod>::template pointer_type<T>
562  >;
563  property_type prop(property);
564  v8::AccessorGetterCallback getter = property_type::template get<Traits>;
565  v8::AccessorSetterCallback setter = property_type::template set<Traits>;
566  if (prop.is_readonly)
567  {
568  setter = nullptr;
569  }
570 
571  class_info_.class_function_template()->PrototypeTemplate()
572  ->SetAccessor(v8pp::to_v8(isolate(), name), getter, setter,
573  detail::set_external_data(isolate(),
574  std::forward<property_type>(prop)), v8::DEFAULT,
575  v8::PropertyAttribute(v8::DontDelete | (setter ? 0 : v8::ReadOnly)));
576  return *this;
577  }
578 
580  template<typename Value>
581  class_& set_const(char const* name, Value const& value)
582  {
583  v8::HandleScope scope(isolate());
584 
585  class_info_.class_function_template()->PrototypeTemplate()
586  ->Set(v8pp::to_v8(isolate(), name), to_v8(isolate(), value),
587  v8::PropertyAttribute(v8::ReadOnly | v8::DontDelete));
588  return *this;
589  }
590 
592  template<typename Value>
593  class_& set_static(char const* name, Value const& value, bool readonly = false)
594  {
595  v8::HandleScope scope(isolate());
596 
597  class_info_.js_function_template()->GetFunction(isolate()->GetCurrentContext()).ToLocalChecked()
598  ->DefineOwnProperty(isolate()->GetCurrentContext(),
599  v8pp::to_v8(isolate(), name), to_v8(isolate(), value),
600  v8::PropertyAttribute(v8::DontDelete | (readonly ? v8::ReadOnly : 0))).FromJust();
601  return *this;
602  }
603 
605  v8::Isolate* isolate() { return class_info_.isolate(); }
606 
607  v8::Local<v8::FunctionTemplate> class_function_template()
608  {
609  return class_info_.class_function_template();
610  }
611 
612  v8::Local<v8::FunctionTemplate> js_function_template()
613  {
614  return class_info_.js_function_template();
615  }
616 
619  static v8::Local<v8::Object> reference_external(v8::Isolate* isolate,
620  object_pointer_type const& ext)
621  {
622  using namespace detail;
623  return classes::find<Traits>(isolate, type_id<T>()).wrap_object(ext, false);
624  }
625 
627  static void unreference_external(v8::Isolate* isolate, object_pointer_type const& ext)
628  {
629  using namespace detail;
630  return classes::find<Traits>(isolate, type_id<T>()).remove_object(Traits::pointer_id(ext));
631  }
632 
636  static v8::Local<v8::Object> import_external(v8::Isolate* isolate, object_pointer_type const& ext)
637  {
638  using namespace detail;
639  return classes::find<Traits>(isolate, type_id<T>()).wrap_object(ext, true);
640  }
641 
643  static object_pointer_type unwrap_object(v8::Isolate* isolate, v8::Local<v8::Value> value)
644  {
645  using namespace detail;
646  return Traits::template static_pointer_cast<T>(
647  classes::find<Traits>(isolate, type_id<T>()).unwrap_object(value));
648  }
649 
651  template<typename ...Args>
652  static v8::Local<v8::Object> create_object(v8::Isolate* isolate, Args... args)
653  {
654  return import_external(isolate,
655  factory<T, Traits>::create(isolate, std::forward<Args>(args)...));
656  }
657 
659  static v8::Local<v8::Object> find_object(v8::Isolate* isolate,
660  object_const_pointer_type const& obj)
661  {
662  using namespace detail;
663  return classes::find<Traits>(isolate, type_id<T>())
664  .find_v8_object(Traits::const_pointer_cast(obj));
665  }
666 
668  static void destroy_object(v8::Isolate* isolate, object_pointer_type const& obj)
669  {
670  using namespace detail;
671  classes::find<Traits>(isolate, type_id<T>()).remove_object(Traits::pointer_id(obj));
672  }
673 
675  static void destroy_objects(v8::Isolate* isolate)
676  {
677  using namespace detail;
678  classes::find<Traits>(isolate, type_id<T>()).remove_objects();
679  }
680 
682  static void destroy(v8::Isolate* isolate)
683  {
684  using namespace detail;
685  classes::remove<Traits>(isolate, type_id<T>());
686  }
687 
688 private:
689  template<typename Attribute>
690  static void member_get(v8::Local<v8::String>,
691  v8::PropertyCallbackInfo<v8::Value> const& info)
692  {
693  v8::Isolate* isolate = info.GetIsolate();
694 
695  try
696  {
697  auto self = unwrap_object(isolate, info.This());
698  Attribute attr = detail::get_external_data<Attribute>(info.Data());
699  info.GetReturnValue().Set(to_v8(isolate, (*self).*attr));
700  }
701  catch (std::exception const& ex)
702  {
703  info.GetReturnValue().Set(throw_ex(isolate, ex.what()));
704  }
705  }
706 
707  template<typename Attribute>
708  static void member_set(v8::Local<v8::String>, v8::Local<v8::Value> value,
709  v8::PropertyCallbackInfo<void> const& info)
710  {
711  v8::Isolate* isolate = info.GetIsolate();
712 
713  try
714  {
715  auto self = unwrap_object(isolate, info.This());
716  Attribute ptr = detail::get_external_data<Attribute>(info.Data());
717  using attr_type = typename detail::function_traits<Attribute>::return_type;
718  (*self).*ptr = v8pp::from_v8<attr_type>(isolate, value);
719  }
720  catch (std::exception const& ex)
721  {
722  info.GetReturnValue().Set(throw_ex(isolate, ex.what()));
723  }
724  }
725 };
726 
729 template<typename T>
730 using shared_class = class_<T, shared_ptr_traits>;
731 
732 void cleanup(v8::Isolate* isolate);
733 
734 } // namespace v8pp
